script: Get-Content "$dir\file_id.diz"
New-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season" -ItemType Directory
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\duo__incantation_(skupers_remixed).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\duo__semicubist.avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\dynamic_duo__curvaceous.avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\dynamic_duo__random_anja_(yathosho_remixed).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\nemoorange__en_la_primavera.avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\nemoorange__miraculous_flow_(duo_remixed).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\skupers__the nights.avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\skupers__thinking_of_vietnam_(nemoorange_remixed).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\yathosho__hotel_garni.avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\yathosho__knäck_en_dajm_njut.avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\skupers_lp6_01.bmp" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs"

Write Host ""; Write-Warning "
This installer wants to install selected APEs required by the presets in the pack. However, if you prefer to keep your locally installed versions, please skip the following step."
Copy-Item -Confirm -Force "$dir\avs\*.ape" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\duo__incantation_(skupers_remixed).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\duo__semicubist.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\dynamic_duo__curvaceous.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\dynamic_duo__random_anja_(yathosho_remixed).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\nemoorange__en_la_primavera.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\nemoorange__miraculous_flow_(duo_remixed).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\skupers__the nights.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\skupers__thinking_of_vietnam_(nemoorange_remixed).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\yathosho__hotel_garni.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season\yathosho__knäck_en_dajm_njut.avs"
Remove-Item -Confirm -Recurse -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC001 The First Season"
